entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming south 30 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
